website_summaries.verdict: A well designed wall mount that combines aesthetic design and practicality at a competitive price.
pros: The Monzltek mount sits roughly 2" away from the wall to allow proper ventilation
We love the additional smaller mount, which is designed to hold the controller
A layer of thin padding on the sides of the mount are in place to protect the dock from potential scratching
cons: Access to USB ports is slightly awkward while the console is mounted

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mount, but...
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as described, but the adhesive included for the controller mount failed after a few days. I woke up to a crashing noise and almost had a heart attack thinking someone broke in haha.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Wall mounted
customer_reviews.text: Installed in boys room and feel confident it won’t fall
customer_reviews.author: Yasin Shouman

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own screws
customer_reviews.text: The wall mounts were fine after a 20 dollar trip to home depot. The screws that come with this product strip way to easily. About three fourths of the way down while putting them in they striped. I couldn't get the screws out without going to home depot and buying a tool to help with the striped screws, then proceeding to purchase some higher quality screws to complete the project.
customer_reviews.author: Lepman023

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: It holds Switch well and steady, the only down side is the game carriage holder easy to slip off when remove Switch base. Other than that it is well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Easy to install. Very secure. Absolutely nothing not to like. I'm especially happy with how the games are displayed on the mount - a really nice touch that puts this mount above the competition. Also, you can't beat having a controller mount included!
customer_reviews.author: MrTophat

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: If you want to mount a switch on the wall, look no further. I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict145

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Able to get it mounted without issue. Haven't had a problem with the mount of the controller mount as of yet, nothing fell off the wall so that's a plus. The drywall anchors that come with it are terrible though as with most things. Highly recommend getting some from Home Depot or Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I lived without it.
customer_reviews.text: Only downfall is cable management and charging a second set of controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great, neat and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very inexpensive—easy to mount. Looks great on the wall and makes everything looks clean and neat.
customer_reviews.author: mixdup929

customer_reviews.title: Well needed!!
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed it to do. Great product for the wall mount when installed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Goinallin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It fits the nintendo switch perfectly. And i can take the switch out easily without problems. And i was able to mount it to the wall without problems. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install, sturdy design, and provides an excellent way to save space for the Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, prefect for any room
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sturdy and seems to be durable. It was perfect for my daughter room since she had no room for a big media table. It definitely looks nice hanging in the wall since it does not take to much space.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome mount!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Very convenient as well. Mount is heavy and well made. Just slip in the dock and boom. Also, the game cartridge holder works perfect. It's snug and won't cause the games to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Abinadabp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and does what it was designed for. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Neu

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it safe
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and so helpful! Our little one can’t reach it now so we know it’s safe:)
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, simple, stylish
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about, everything is spot on! The cartridge slots are super handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great place to charge and store. Also made room on my entertainment center and looks organized.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install and looks great on my wall.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Mounted it right next to our tv in the living room

customer_reviews.title: Must have

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I loved that its just very convenient and space saver it looks awesome and you can just put the most played games in there for easy access

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product! I'm really glad I got this product and it was really simple to install! I highly recommend this!

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome

product_meta.title: Monzlteck Wall Mount for Switch+Controller Mount,Game Card Holder,Solid Metal
product_meta.description:
Convenience is everything in todays world, and we at Monzlteck want to ensure that your have the best possible experience while using our products.
Customer Service is our first and foremost priority and we would not endorse a product if we didn't feel it was the absolute best that it could be. We take a lot of pride is creating products that make your life easy. When is comes to playing your switch, the last thing you need to worry about is where your going to place it and whether it will be damaged. Eliminate the worry and create an environment that is not only stress free, but will make it easier than ever to enjoy all the games that you love.
feature_bullets: CUSTOM MOUNT FOR SWITCH: Make The Switch And Controller Near Or Behind Your Wall Mount TV
SAVE SPACE AROUND YOUR TV:you only need 2.5 inches between the back of your tv and the wall
QUICK HEAT DISSIPATIONR:Its made of solid metal and is off-set from the wall to ensure proper airflow to the machine, and allow your switch to live a much longer, happier life
EASY INSTALLATION:You'll Be Able To Install This Wall Mount Quickly And Easily,Includes Wall Screws, Anchors,Level Vial.
CARD HOLDER:The games could be exhibited when not used.
